Reviews.Title: The camera is great, but the bundle...
Reviews.Author: Luiz
Reviews.Content: The camera and the 18-55mm lens are great, but the 75-300 lens isn't. The Backpack fell apart after a couple of months of LIGHT use. There's a lot of junk, meaning low quality things in this bundle. Good price isn't good when the quality is low.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I looked around a while to see what kind of packages there were with this camera.  I found a few diffent ones but ended up desiding on this set.  From what I seen it's the best set for the money.  I got my package within a few days.  Everything was packaged well.  No complaints here.  Can't wait to really get out and beable to use that camera and see what all it can do.

Reviews.Title: EOS T3i DSLR
Reviews.Author: Nahkhii
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera and the package deal is great!  The camera's smarter than I am and while I've used mostly the auto mode I've also been playing with other modes and options and gotten some great shots.  The transition to digital SLR from an older Pentax SLR has been easy.  The package deal provided virtually everything I need as an amateur, and the quality of the pieces is certainly acceptable, especially at the price.  Recommended without reservation.

Reviews.Title: Perfect starter kit
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: Love this set!  Perfect gift for someone just starting out in photography! I recommend this to everyone interested in a nice camera set for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Best deal, and magical delivery :-)
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: In short: This deal is better then one on a Canon website. All items are brand new (not refurbished, or anything). I've already took more then two thousand pictures with this camera and lenses. Worth every penny. Please note, that 300mm lens has no image stabilization, but tripod is included in this deal anyway.As for a delivery... I can't explain it, but I've got the package ON THE NEXT DAY after I've placed an order on Amazon. Now I understand what the word "Cameta" in "Cameta Camera" means. :-)

Reviews.Title: Arrived perfectly
Reviews.Author: Joe A
Reviews.Content: It is a lot of money to spend on a camera kit worth almost $1000 from Australia. The product arrived as advertised and intact... very impressed.

Reviews.Title: CANON IS A KEEPER!
Reviews.Author: dalesorano
Reviews.Content: I absolutely Love my canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital SLR Camera! The bundle and everything included in it is excellent quality and superior performance. I love this camera! It takes amazing pictures even for amatuers! and Amazon always has low competitive prices!

Reviews.Title: Good Deal!
Reviews.Author: Doug Turner
Reviews.Content: I found the Camera and accessories to be above expectations. I couldn't find a better deal anywhere. The camera is of exceptional quality, as well as the lenses.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Cam for beginners in photography
Reviews.Author: Jagadish
Reviews.Content: Its a best cam for less price... I love it.  I started my photography and its best for beginners who like to shoot indoor.

Reviews.Title: Canon Bundle...
Reviews.Author: Jason Barrera
Reviews.Content: This particular bundle has been really good to me. The camera of course is really good, it may be an earlier model but it does the job. I'm using it for film making mostly, and it has treated me really well. As for the 300mm lens, it works really well when shooting at 60fps, and capturing slow motion. Smooth and natural. The rest of the bundle pack has been great. No complaints as of yet. Thank you Canon.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Treveire D. Wilson
Reviews.Content: A lot of equipment for a good price.  Especially for a person that has been into photography since I owned an Olympus OM-10.

Reviews.Title: Best camera I found for the value and easy!
Reviews.Author: Elaine Van Etten
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera, and the bundle was excellent. I'm not a camera or tetchy person, but this is easy to use and you can read and u der stand the directions! Always a plus. I still have a lot to learn, but the pictures are far greater than my old camera. The motion option is what I needed and takes excellent pics as well. Hope to have this camera for years to come :)

Reviews.Title: very good deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Jorge A.
Reviews.Content: the camera is great and we are starting to learn how to become "expert". all itmes are really good, specially the backpack, really good and confortable. all accesories that come with the camera makes the deal a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera Kit
Reviews.Author: Alicia Taylor
Reviews.Content: I had never used a DSLR camera before, so it took some getting used to the learning curve.  This kit is a great kit for a beginning photographer.  I didn't care for the carrying bag that came with it.  Within a month, the interior had already ripped.  It was cumbersome and finding stuff stored in it was difficult.  I am still using the Tripod and really like the features.  It has many adjustments to get the perfect angle on your shots and bubble levels make it easy to tell if the camera is straight.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying this upgrade from my Canon Powershot SX
Reviews.Author: Shawn Sumpter
Reviews.Content: I loved my Canon Powershot and its predicessor.  My husband's camera died and I got to upgrade so he could have my hand-me-down.  I figured it was time to go full DSLR.This was an easy upgrade.  Most of the controls are the same or similar to the Powershot series and the automatic settings are a no brainer.  That means I was able to take the camera out of the box and immediately start taking pictures.  Decent pictures.  I am not an expert by any means but need to be able to take pictures of college level running events. Very happy with the performance.  I originally intended to get the package with the 55-250 IS lens but clicked the wrong item on my wish list.  I was concerned that I might not be steady enough without the lens stabilization at full zoom without using a tripod (not always able to at a meet).  I am happy with the results of the non-IS lens.The camera feels good and is comfortable to use over an extended hand held time even with the large zoom lens attached.The product description was not clear but this package did include two batteries total.  One with the camera and one additional as a part of the package.  Very ahppy about that.  So far I have taken about 500 pictures.  I do not leave the view screen on by default but I do tend to do a lot of revie/playback periodically during an event to see if I am really getting what I think I am getting. Still working on the original full battery charge. Very, very happy about that!

Reviews.Title: awesome starter package.
Reviews.Author: martin rostami
Reviews.Content: got this package because compared to other bundles that I researched it was the most bang for the buck. compared to costco and best buy, you have everything you need all in one and more. shipping to a little longer than expected because it was going from east coast to west coast. but without a doubt awesome package for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Gabriella Hoiland
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.ProsIt's fast. Quality pictures. Excellent battery life. And everything works just like it's suppose to except for the extra battery.ConsThe extra battery does not work with this cameraI would def recommend this camera. Basically in love right now :)

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: E. Louton
Reviews.Content: This is the third camera we have purchased from this Company.  We purchased one for each of our sons and one for ourselves.  Everyone has completely enjoyed their cameras.  The product is exactly as advertised, and the kits are great.

Reviews.Title: This is a great deal!
Reviews.Author: D'arcy White
Reviews.Content: I have been a long standing Canon customer starting with my first 35mm EOS back in the 80's. I used it for over 20 years! The amount of equipment that you get with this is a great deal if you look at each individual piece. You just can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Tracey S. Person "reader"
Reviews.Content: I got the reviews before purchasing the camera, and got it from Amazon at a great price.  I've used it alot already, but haven't tried the extra lenses yet.  The backpack that came with this bundle is awesome for safely storing all the accessories as well as the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: mdmatus
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. I'm a very novice photographer and didn't have any trouble taking great pictures with this camera right out of the box. I ordered this right before a 2 week vacation in Central America and only took about 4,000 pictures while there. I still have to learn the ins and outs of the camera but you can put it in auto mode and go. It takes beautiful pictures. This pkg deal is the best deal out there. My camera case had a strap come apart so I called the folks I ordered it from and they sent me a new one right away. I haven't tried the video yet. I based my purchase on all the reviews about this camera and for the money this is the best out there in the entry level cameras.

Reviews.Title: Rebel T31
Reviews.Author: mrcrb1982
Reviews.Content: Love this package, except the backpack case. It's tearing and ripped inside, under 6 months of owning this system. A lot of items to use for new digital user. READ the manuals, don't guess your way thur the camera. Im guessing and reading!  Love this camera. Need a great flash and a better long range Lens.

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: Romie
Reviews.Content: I searched around every site and local stores in NYC to buy a good beginners DSLR deal. Although it does not offer free shipping still the deal costs much less than any other dealers. The kit contained everything as mentioned and in a very good quality. Happy to find this deal and strongly recommend Cameta camera in stead of wasting money in Bestbuy , Ritz camera.

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto
Reviews.Author: Alejogeffen
Reviews.Content: Compre la camara y el kit desde colombia, compre 2 y la atencion a sido estupenda el producto 100% nuevo original y enperfectas condiciones al igual que los accesorios, todo lo que ofrecen es lo que venden, vendedor 100% recomendado, tiempo de entrega el acordado. Gracias Cameta Camara

<4> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <5> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <6> Spare LP-E8 Battery + <7> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter +
<8> Additional Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <9> .45x Wide Angle Lens (58mm) + <10> 2x Telephoto Lens (58mm) + <11> Precision Design 57" Tripod +
<12> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <15> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens with 75-300mm Lens + 16GB Card + .45x Wide Angle & 2x Telephoto Lenses + Tripod + Case + Battery + Remote + (2) Filters + Accessory Kit
